item.title: Jane rated The Great Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald - 5 stars
item.description: Jane rated it 5 out of 5 stars. Absolutely stunning prose and a masterful critique of the American Dream.

item.title: Jane rated 1984 by George Orwell - 4 stars
item.description: Jane rated it 4 out of 5 stars. Chilling and prescient.

item.title: Jane wants to read To Kill a Mockingbird by Harper Lee
item.description: Jane added To Kill a Mockingbird to their want to read shelf.

item.title: Jane rated Project Hail Mary by Andy Weir ★★★★★
item.description: Amazing sci-fi adventure! Rocky is the best.

item.title: Jane gave it 5 stars: The Midnight Library by Matt Haig
item.description: A beautiful exploration of regret and possibility.
